name: Alga Biosciences
all_locations: Berkeley, CA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA
long_description: Alga Biosciences is a fast-moving startup focused on transforming the agricultural industry. Our mission is to make an immediate, dramatic impact on global methane emissions produced by enteric fermentation in partnership with the cattle industry. We believe in leveraging biology to tackle the worldâ€™s biggest problems.
one_liner: We stop cows from burping methane.
